basic.description: Explores current issues in nursing and in delivery of health care which affect the new graduate. Topics include legal, ethical and quality-of-work issues, and career planning. 9 units (3 credits) course weight.
basic.subject: NURS
basic.title: Cur Issues In Nur & Hlth Care

extra.enrollment_requirement: (NURS305 AND NURS340) OR (NURS305 AND NURS315) OR (NURS305 AND NURS316) OR (NURS305 AND NURS324) OR (NURS305 AND NURS325) OR (NURS305 AND NURS345) OR (NURS301 AND NURS407) OR (NURS301 AND NURS408) OR (NURS301 AND NURS409)
